Check CRAN results

Source: R/check.R
check_cran_results.Rd

Return latest CRAN build results.

check_cran_results(package_name)

Arguments

package_name

Name of the package.

Examples

check_cran_results("dplyr")
#>                               Flavor Version Tinstall Tcheck  Ttotal Status
#> 1  r-devel-linux-x86_64-debian-clang   0.7.6   344.43 121.58  466.01     OK
#> 2    r-devel-linux-x86_64-debian-gcc   0.7.6   307.82  95.66  403.48   WARN
#> 3  r-devel-linux-x86_64-fedora-clang   0.7.6       NA     NA  684.29   NOTE
#> 4    r-devel-linux-x86_64-fedora-gcc   0.7.6       NA     NA  634.30   WARN
#> 5        r-devel-windows-ix86+x86_64   0.7.6   800.00 274.00 1074.00   NOTE
#> 6             r-patched-linux-x86_64   0.7.6   381.92 113.80  495.72     OK
#> 7              r-patched-solaris-x86   0.7.6       NA     NA  574.50   NOTE
#> 8             r-release-linux-x86_64   0.7.6   371.41 113.99  485.40     OK
#> 9      r-release-windows-ix86+x86_64   0.7.6   824.00 269.00 1093.00   NOTE
#> 10              r-release-osx-x86_64   0.7.6       NA     NA      NA   NOTE
#> 11      r-oldrel-windows-ix86+x86_64   0.7.6   613.00 225.00  838.00   NOTE
